name: Crab crusted redfish
description: Pan seared redfish topped with Jumbo lump crab meat with little bit of breading and then toasted to perfection. Drizzled with lemon butter sauce, served over garlic blistered green beans and roasted red bell pepper sauce.

name: Chicken Melanese￼
description: Panko crusted chicken breast flat grilled and then baked to Golden Brown topped with artichoke hearts, capers in lemon butter sauce. Serves with garlic green beans.

name: Ribeye￼
description: 12 ounce. Ribeye have most fat between all steaks which makes it most flavorful. Serves with bacon Brussels and mash potatoes.

name: Filet￼
description: 6oz. Very tender with good flavor, but not as flavorful as ribeye. Mash potatoes and garlic green beans.

name: Short rib￼
description: Slow braised short rib in Shiner beer for 5.5 hours topped with caramelized onions and drizzled with shiner brown grawy. Served over Gouda grits and bacon brussel sprouts.

name: Bacon wrap shrimp and grits
description: Jalapeño, cheese and crab with breadding staffed shrimp and wrapped in bacon. Deep fried and served over creole sauce (tomato based lobster sauce) with grits.

name: Hearsay Cheeseburger
description: Wagyu beef (fancy breed of the cow), cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato, fresh red onion, chipotle aioli (mayo based sauce), rosemary and parmesan fry mix. Patty cooked to desired temperature.

name: Shrimp and sausage fetticcini
description: Sautéed shrimp and jalapeño sausage, cherry tomatoes, with fettuccini in Creole Sauce - tomato based lobster sauce.

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: CRISPY FRIED OR GRILLED. Focaccia, lettuce, mozzarella, smoked bacon, avocado, tomato, chipotle aioli, rosemary and parmesan fry mix

name: Blackened Redfish Taco
description: Corn tortillas, pico de gallo, shredded lettuce, avocado, chipotle aioli, served with street corn casserole. Glutein Free

name: Crunchy Ahi Tuna Tacos
description: Marinated tuna (not cooked), ginger cilantro slaw, ponzu, avocado, gochujang aioli on fried Wontong shell. Served with street corn casserole

name: Roasted Poblano Soup
description: Cup or Bowl. Garnished with fried tortilla crisps and queso fresco

name: House salad
description: mixed greens, tomato, carrots, cucumber, and sweet sherry vinaigrette dressing

name: Avo-Cucumber
description: Sliced avocado, cucumber ribbons, mixed greens, tomato. Topped with queso fresco, dressed with sweet sherry vinaigrette

name: Seasonal Harvest
description: Mixed greens, honeycrisp apples, grapes, candied pecans and fried goat cheese, red onion, tomato. Poppyseed dressing

name: Gem Wedge
description: 2 iceberg wedges topped with blue cheese crumbles, cherry tomato, bacon, carrot, chives and drizzled with ranch

name: Califlower «Crabcake»
description: Flat grilled califlower in shape of crabcake and cilantro tartar on the side

name: Espresso Pork Chop
description: Espresso and blackaning rubbed pork chop grilled to med well or well done temperature. Serves with Sweet potato mash and broccolini. Topped with sweet Woodford glaze

name: Hearsay Bistro Steak
description: New York Strip cooked to your liking and sliced, topped with peppercorn mushroom gravy. Served with mash potato and green beans

name: Pistachio Crusted Scallops
description: 5 seared scallops topped with pistachios served over sweet potato mash and broccolini. Accompanied with Chanpagne Safron sauce

name: Tuscan Chicken Pasta
description: Grilled chicken with fettucine, broccolini, spinach, cherry tomato in tomato cream sauce

name: Atlantic Seared Salmon
description: Seared Salmon to Med Well (unless desired otherwise) topped with Lemon Cream & Dill sauce with jumbo crab meat. Served with corn cake and grilled squash and zuccini

name: TX Wagyu Patty Melt
description: Texas Wagyu patty (cooked med well unless desired otherwise) with caramelized onion, cheddar cheese, jalapeño, chipotle aioli. Served with rosemary parmesan fries

name: Wagyu Chicago Style Hot Dog
description: Jalapeno sausage in brioche roll, topped with mild giardiniera. Sprinkled with mustard and served with rosmery parmesan fries
